Developer Platform

![GLOBAL AI CLOUD PLATFORM SERVICE PROVIDER](https://seapromotionstatic.cdn5th.com/static/206715313964957696.jpg)

# GLOBAL AI CLOUD PLATFORM SERVICE PROVIDER

Why choose Tuya Smart

Tuya Inc. (NYSE: TUYA; HKEX: 2391) is a leading global AI cloud platform service provider dedicated to bringing AI into everyday life. Through its TuyaOpen open-source development framework and universal AI Agent engines, including the AI Agent development platform, Tuya integrates multimodal AI capabilities to lower barriers for AI development, efficiently advancing the realization of AI-driven lifestyles and accelerating AI integration with the physical world. Tuya offers innovative physical AI solutions for smart devices, commercial applications, and industry developers through its cloud computing and spatial intelligence capabilities. It also provides a complete, open, and neutral global AIoT ecosystem. This approach fosters a vibrant global developer community comprising brands, OEMs, AI agents, system integrators, and independent software vendors who collaborate to create smart solution ecosystems embodying the principles of sustainability, security, efficiency, agility, and openness. As of September 30, 2025, the Tuya AI Developer Platform had over 1,622,000 registered AI developers from more than 200 countries and regions.

2014

FUTURE

06/2014

Tuya was Founded

12/2014

Completed A-round funding

04/2015

Unveiled first Wi-Fi module

11/2016

Won the 2016 China Smart Hardware Solution Award

08/2017

Completed B-round funding

10/2017

Held the first AI+IoT Business Conference

05/2018

Completed C-round funding

08/2018

Won IFA 2018 "Smart Interconnected Platform Innovation Award"

09/2018

Won the 2018 METIS Awards for Intelligent Terminals; Selected in the China AI Top 50 List at Summer Davos

10/2018

Held the second AI+IoT Business Conference

01/2019

Won CES 2019 “AI+IoT Technology Innovation Platform” Award

02/2019

Named one of the "Top 25 IoT Startups to Watch In 2019" by Forbes; Announced partnership with Qualcomm at MWC 2019

04/2019

Held the Spring Season of the 2019 AI+IoT Business Conference; Launched six SaaS-Level industry solutions for housing, hotel, elderly care, security, and apartment

05/2019

Listed in the Hurun Research Unicorn List in 2019

09/2019

Completed D-round funding led by NEA, China Broadband Capital, etc.

10/2019

Held the Fall Season of the 2019 AI+IoT Business Conference; Established the Global Strategic Committee of Tuya

05/2020

Held the Spring Season of the 2020 AI+IoT Business Conference; Launched Cloud Development Platform and "cloud manufacturing" system

07/2020

Held the first "Global Hard Technology Developer Conference" in Xiamen, and signed the MOU with the local government

12/2020

Released the 2021 Global AIoT Developers Ecosystem White Paper with Gartner

01/2021

Completed E-round funding led by Hillhouse Capital, etc.

03/2021

Went public on the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker symbol TUYA

07/2022

Completed dual primary listing on the main board of the HKEX with the ticker symbol of 2391.

Drawing the Future of Tuya · A Universe of Possibilities
